name: loggly
hubDesc: Send request and response logs to Loggly
description: Log request and response data over UDP to Loggly.

fields.name: host
fields.help: The IP address or host name of Loggly server

fields.name: port
fields.help: The UDP port to send data to on the Loggly server

fields.name: tags
fields.help: An optional list of tags to support segmentation & filtering of logs.

fields.name: timeout
fields.help: An optional timeout in milliseconds when sending data to the Loggly server

fields.name: successful_severity
fields.help: An optional logging severity assigned to the all successful requests with response status code 400 .

fields.name: client_errors_severity
fields.help: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 400 or higher but less than 500.

fields.name: server_errors_severity
fields.help: An optional logging severity assigned to the all failed requests with response status code 500 or higher.

fields.name: log_level
fields.help: An optional logging severity, any request with equal or higher severity will be logged to Loggly.
